page.title: 08WOODFORD BUS SERVICE
page.content: How do old people get to the bus stop ? Young people can easily walk up a hill to the bus stop, but older people cannot walk to the bus stop. Most of the older people cannot drive because they are not rich enough to afford a car. Some old people have daughters and sons who could drive them to the bus stop but others have none at all so they stay at home and never go out to town, except to the village shop or the greengrocer who goes around the village once a week. The bus does not go down into the village but stays up at the top of the village and expects the old people to walk up the hill to catch it. I think all country buses should go down into the village so the old people can have a chance to go out to town.
